Sentencas: As concerns related to climate change continue to grow, there has been an increasing number of studies on materials that can enhance the efficiency of energy conversion/storage systems.
Titulo: Boosted Oxygen Reduction Reaction Activity by Ordering Cations in the A-Site of a Perovskite Catalyst

Sentencas: Since the oxygen reduction reaction (ORR) is considered as a rate-determining reaction for the O2 conversion system, it is essential to develop an efficient electrocatalyst that enables greater ORR activity.
Titulo: Boosted Oxygen Reduction Reaction Activity by Ordering Cations in the A-Site of a Perovskite Catalyst

Sentencas: Perovskite has been explored as a promising electrocatalyst due to its excellent ORR activity at high and room temperatures.
Titulo: Boosted Oxygen Reduction Reaction Activity by Ordering Cations in the A-Site of a Perovskite Catalyst

Sentencas: Recently, unique perovskite structures that can contain high oxygen vacancy ratios, such as brownmillerite, Ruddlesden-Popper, and layered perovskite, have been studied for exhibiting high ORR performance.
Titulo: Boosted Oxygen Reduction Reaction Activity by Ordering Cations in the A-Site of a Perovskite Catalyst

Sentencas: However, few studies have dealt with the electrochemical properties of perovskite, which has different structures but the same cation stoichiometry, to know the exact effect of a specific structure.
Titulo: Boosted Oxygen Reduction Reaction Activity by Ordering Cations in the A-Site of a Perovskite Catalyst

Sentencas: In this study, we synthesized two materials with different structures (cubic structure perovskite and layered structure perovskite) but with the same cation stoichiometry.
Titulo: Boosted Oxygen Reduction Reaction Activity by Ordering Cations in the A-Site of a Perovskite Catalyst

Sentencas: The layered structure rather than the cubic structure showed cation ordering in the A-site of the perovskite structure with an enhanced oxygen vacancy ratio.
Titulo: Boosted Oxygen Reduction Reaction Activity by Ordering Cations in the A-Site of a Perovskite Catalyst

Sentencas: As a result, the layered structure exhibits superior electrochemical performance than the cubic structure at high and room temperatures by a factor of ca.
Titulo: Boosted Oxygen Reduction Reaction Activity by Ordering Cations in the A-Site of a Perovskite Catalyst

Sentencas: 2.7 at 500 degrees C in fuel cell mode, and ca.
Titulo: Boosted Oxygen Reduction Reaction Activity by Ordering Cations in the A-Site of a Perovskite Catalyst

Sentencas: 5.5% decrease in overpotential (1) at -3 mA cm-2 for ORR catalysis.
Titulo: Boosted Oxygen Reduction Reaction Activity by Ordering Cations in the A-Site of a Perovskite Catalyst

Sentencas: Moreover, perovskite hybridized with nitrogen doped reduced graphene oxide (N-rGO) could compensate for the intrinsic shortcoming of perovskite oxide and exert a catalytic synergy (27% decrease in 1).
Titulo: Boosted Oxygen Reduction Reaction Activity by Ordering Cations in the A-Site of a Perovskite Catalyst
